subject: Delivery question
description_text:
I ordered pedals and shifter but the web site says only the shifter is
shipped. Are they one package or separate? Order number is #SSN4715

conversations.body_text: Hi Atem,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Currently, the base plate inventory at our German warehouse is depleted, with restocking expected today. We will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees you paid.

My pedals are still yet to be shipped nor is my shipping refunded. Quite
disappointing as you said you are restocking a week ago

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025, 10:08 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Atem,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order was scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to shipping delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They arrived yesterday, and we have now shipped your order and updated your shipping notification.

Thank you for the update.

On Wed, Dec 24, 2025, 10:57 AM service@simsonn.com
